title: After this patch I can't play at all. The game crashes and prevents me from playing anything.
body:
Dear Riot,

The client works just fine but I bugsplat as soon as I try to get into the game. Bam. Crash. I keep sending error reports and trying to reload but it either stops at the 60% loaded in mark or I get to play for a few seconds before it kicks me out. Reinstalling didn't help either.

Please help.

This is a screenshot of basically what happens.

http://i.imgur.com/jYxB4rx.png

Thanks,
A loyal player

replies.body: I'm so glad to hear everything is okay now!  Thanks for following up, and best of luck on the rift!

Repair instructions are available in the above guide.  Crash course:  select the "?" icon on the top right of the patcher.  There will be an option to select Repair.  It will take a few moments for the repair tool to scan and update any corrupt files.  Hope that helps!

Hey,

Just getting back to say that repair and then updating the drivers for my gtx 970 and then restart fixed it. Thanks so much!
I'm having the exact same issue, someone please help D:

It looks like something is failing to load properly within your game files, and causing the game to crash.  I recommend going over our [Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide to troubleshoot this, which include updating your graphics driver and possibly running a repair.

Hey,

Thanks for the reply! How do I run a repair?
